replies.body:
@Alex
Can bananas fly? - Of course but only if you believe.

@Blizzem
 What was the last lie you told? - That Avicus doesn't lag.
What is your perfect pizza?- Canadian (mushrooms, pepperoni and bacon) 
How do you start a conversation? - hi (spammed about 5 times)

@Petlas
Why the username 99250? - I'm not actually sure why I picked the username. I know it must have something to do with the game FreedomForce on my old computer because that is the first time I used it, ever since then its been my username for everything.

@Rezner
What kind of music do you like? - Rock, Pop, Dubstep, Country and Classical. Pretty much any kind of music I will listen to. 

@Ky
Ontario or Calgary? - Ontario.

@Blaze
Why the username 99250? - Same reason I told Petlas.
